ygData.subject: RE: Bones, bones bones...
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless they have changed it, the 16th level pet only uses 2 bone chips.  If you want a ton of bone chips and you don t mind not feeling self sufficient then go
ygData.messageBody:
Unless they have changed it, the 16th level pet only uses 2 bone chips. If
you want a ton of bone chips and you don't mind not feeling self sufficient
then go near the entrance to Halas and pay a newbie to go buy you all the
chips you could ever use. I bought 350 bone chips off a newbie when I was
15th level and I have only dug into half of them by level 24. Just be
careful in everfrost, invisibility wouldn't be a bad idea.

Dicey
-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher King [mailto:CKing@...]
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 6:47 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Bones, bones bones...


ok.. call me silly:

Up till now (lev 16 jsut last night) I have been bonecollecting by
huniting.
I like the self sufficient feeling it gives me!
But if I read correctly the 16th lev pet uses 5 bones per cast! that will
be hard to harvest. So time to buy. It never occurred to me before, but ARE
there vendors who sell bone chips in quantity? At the guild maybe? I have
only seen single chips on vendors out in the fields and such...

thx :)
<blushes>
Stricken
Gnome, Vallon Zek
